description: Get your little one ready for sunny adventures with this official Marvel boys' hat and sunglasses set! The stylish baseball cap features a protective peak, breathable fabric, and an internal sweatband to keep kids cool and comfortable. The sunglasses provide 100% UV protection (UV 400 GS approved), ensuring their eyes stay safe from the sun. Designed in one-size-fits-all, this set grows with them, making it perfect for multiple summers. A must-have for Marvel fans, this cool and practical gift is great for birthdays, holidays, or any special occasion! See images for more features and details.
